name: Erudite
entries: You have studied so much that you carry encyclopedic knowledge at your fingertips.

items: You become proficient in two skills of your choice chosen from Arcana, History, Nature, or Religion.

When you take the {@action Help} action to aid another creature, that creature gains a bonus to the check equal to your proficiency bonus, as you share pertinent advice and historical examples. To receive this bonus, the creature must be able to understand you.
